verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Alleluia|strong="G0239"\w*; \w Salvation|strong="G4991"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \add are\add* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w judgments|strong="G2920"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* he hath \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w whore|strong="G4204"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* did \w corrupt|strong="G5351"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w avenged|strong="G1556"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w at|strong="G1537"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G1208"\w* they \w said|strong="G2046"\w*, \w Alleluia|strong="G0239"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* rose \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*; \w Alleluia|strong="G0239"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* came \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Praise|strong="G0134"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* ye \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w small|strong="G3398"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w mighty|strong="G2478"\w* \w thunderings|strong="G1027"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Alleluia|strong="G0239"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w omnipotent|strong="G3841"\w* \w reigneth|strong="G0936"\w*.

Let us be \w glad|strong="G5463"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G0021"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w honour|strong="G1391"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w marriage|strong="G1062"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* hath \w made|strong="G2090"\w* \w herself|strong="G1438"\w* \w ready|strong="G2090"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w her|strong="G0846"\w* was \w granted|strong="G1325"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* she should be \w arrayed|strong="G4016"\w* in fine \w linen|strong="G1039"\w*, \w clean|strong="G2513"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w white|strong="G2986"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the fine \w linen|strong="G1039"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1345"\w* of \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Write|strong="G1125"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \add are\add* they \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w marriage|strong="G1062"\w* \w supper|strong="G1173"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w sayings|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w at|strong="G1715"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* to \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w See|strong="G3708"\w* \add thou do it\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*: I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w fellowservant|strong="G4889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* that \w have|strong="G2192"\w* the \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*: \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* a \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w horse|strong="G2462"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add was\add* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w True|strong="G0228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* he doth \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* make \w war|strong="G4170"\w*.

\w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \add were\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w flame|strong="G5395"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \add were\add* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w crowns|strong="G1238"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* he \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* he \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G4016"\w* \add was\add* clothed \w with|strong="G4016"\w* a \w vesture|strong="G2440"\w* \w dipped|strong="G0911"\w* in \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* The \w Word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w armies|strong="G4753"\w* \add which were\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w horses|strong="G2462"\w*, clothed \w in|strong="G1746"\w* fine \w linen|strong="G1039"\w*, \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w goeth|strong="G1607"\w* a \w sharp|strong="G3691"\w* \w sword|strong="G4501"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* he should \w smite|strong="G3960"\w* the \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w rule|strong="G4165"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w rod|strong="G4464"\w* of \w iron|strong="G4603"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w treadeth|strong="G3961"\w* the \w winepress|strong="G3025"\w* of the \w fierceness|strong="G2372"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* of \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \add his\add* \w vesture|strong="G2440"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w thigh|strong="G3382"\w* a name \w written|strong="G3686"\w*, \w KING|strong="G1125"\w* OF \w KINGS|strong="G0935"\w*, \w AND|strong="G0935"\w* \w LORD|strong="G2532"\w* OF \w LORDS|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w an|strong="G1520"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w fowls|strong="G3732"\w* that \w fly|strong="G4072"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the midst of \w heaven|strong="G3321"\w*, \w Come|strong="G1205"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gather yourselves \w together|strong="G4863"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w supper|strong="G1173"\w* of the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* of \w kings|strong="G0935"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* of \w captains|strong="G5506"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* of mighty \w men|strong="G2478"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* of \w horses|strong="G2462"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sit|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men, both\add* \w free|strong="G1658"\w* \w and|strong="G1401"\w* \w bond|strong="G2532"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w small|strong="G3398"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w armies|strong="G4753"\w*, gathered \w together|strong="G4863"\w* to \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w war|strong="G4171"\w* \w against|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w horse|strong="G2462"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w against|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w army|strong="G4753"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* was \w taken|strong="G4084"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G5127"\w* the false \w prophet|strong="G5578"\w* that \w wrought|strong="G4160"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that had \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w mark|strong="G5480"\w* of the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w*. These \w both|strong="G1417"\w* were \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w alive|strong="G2198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w lake|strong="G3041"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w burning|strong="G2545"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w brimstone|strong="G2303"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w remnant|strong="G3062"\w* were \w slain|strong="G0615"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sword|strong="G4501"\w* of \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w horse|strong="G2462"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \add sword\add* \w proceeded|strong="G1607"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w fowls|strong="G3732"\w* were \w filled|strong="G5526"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.
